actiontrackingcamera_option_camerarotati: Can rotate the camera to keep up with the action
actiontrackingcamera_option_pausetrackin: Pause camera tracking when the user moves the mouse etc
actiontrackingcamera_option_showcommenta: Show a commentary panel with information about the action
actiontrackingcamera_option_showtracking: Draw a reticle around the units being tracked
areareclaimtrees_option_areareclaimavoid: Enabling causes area reclaim orders to avoid reclaiming trees and other energy-only features. Reclaim trees by issuing the order centred on a tree or by holding Ctrl.\n\nThe behaviour is reversed when disabled, causing orders given with Ctrl held to avoid reclaiming trees.
autogroup_option_addall_desc: Existing units will be added to group# when setting autogroup#.
autogroup_option_immediatemode_desc: Units built/resurrected/received are added to autogroups immediately instead of waiting them to be idle.
autogroup_option_preserveautogroups_desc: Preserve auto groupings for next game. Unchecking this clears the groups!
autopatrolnanos_option_caretakerautomati: Caretakers will automatically find tasks when idle. They may assist, repair or reclaim. Also applies to Strider Hub.
autopatrolnanos_option_disablecaretakers: Caretakers automation is put on hold with the Stop command. Automation resumes after any other command. Also applies to Strider Hub.
autopatrolnanosv2_option_caretakerautoma: Caretakers will automatically find tasks when idle. They may assist, repair or reclaim. Also applies to Strider Hub.
autopatrolnanosv2_option_disablecaretake: Caretakers automation is put on hold with the Stop command. Automation resumes after any other command. Also applies to Strider Hub.
battleresourcetracker_option_battleradiu: The size of an individual battle. Lower radius detects more distinct battles.
battleresourcetracker_option_battletimes: How long a battle persists until it fades. New kills refresh battle time.
battleresourcetracker_option_cleardata_d: Forget previous events. Hotkey this button.
battleresourcetracker_option_showtext_de: Whether to show text. Use this to toggle the text while keeping tracking active.
buildeta_option_showforicons_desc: Whether to show for radar icons during strategic zoom.
buildingstarter_option_placenanoframes_d: Hold this key during structure placement to queue structures which are to placed but not constructed.
camerasaveposition_option_savezoomaswell: Save zoom as well as position
Save more information about the camera state. This may break if you change camera type midgame.
chilichat22_option_autohidechat_desc: Hides the chat when not in use
chilichat22_option_defaultallychat_desc: Sets default chat mode to allies at game start
chilichatbubbles_option_filterglobalchat: Filter out messages made in global chat
chilichatbubbles_option_screenheightoffi: How high up the first bubble should start on the right of the screen.
chilichatbubbles_option_setanavatar_desc: Avatar to show next to your bubble. Requires the Avatar widget
chilicoreselector_option_selectidleconst: Selects an idle constructor. Use multiple times to select more. Deselects any units which are not idle constructors.
chilicoreselector_option_selectidlepreci: Selects an idle, armed precision bomber. Use multiple times to select more. Deselects any units which are not idle, armed precision bombers.
chilicoreselector_option_swapcameracente: When enabled left click a commander or factory to center the camera on it. When disabled right click centers.
chilicrudeplayerlistold_option_enabledeb: Enables some debug messages (disable if it starts flooding console)
chilicrudeplayerlistold_option_resetwins: Reset the win counts of all players
chilicrudeplayerlistold_option_showspect: Show spectators in main window (rather than confining them to tooltip. Note: tooltip might block mouse click in some cases)
chilideluxeplayerlistalpha202_option_ali: Align to left and grow rightwards (vs. align to right and grow leftwards)
Align to top and grow downwards (vs. align to bottom and grow upwards)
chilideluxeplayerlistalpha202_option_lis: List Size: Who should be included?
chilideluxeplayerlistalpha202_option_res: Reset the win counts of all players
chilideluxeplayerlistalpha202_option_sho: Show the clan, country, and rank columns
Show ping and cpu stats as text (vs. as an icon)
Show tooltips where available (vs. hiding all tooltips. Note: tooltip might block mouse click in some cases)
Display resource statistics: metal in mobile units and static defences; metal and energy income.
chilideluxeplayerlistalpha202_option_vis: Set a hotkey here to toggle the playerlist on and off
chilidocking_option_minimizablewindows_d: When enabled certain windows will have minimization tabs.
chilidocking_option_usedockingbetweenpan: Dock windows each other to prevent overlaps. Requires docking to be enabled via the previous setting.
chilieconomypaneldefault_option_flowasar: Use arrows instead of a number for the flow. Each arrow is 5 resources per second.
chilieconomypaneldefault_option_hideifsp: Should the panel hide when spectating?
chilieconomypaneldefault_option_showeffi: Show the minimum of Metal Income/Metal Pull and Energy Income/Energy Pull as a percentage. Use Ctrl+F11 to reposition as Escape to cancel.
chilieconomypaneldefault_option_showover: Show overdrive energy:metal ratio, metal income, and energy cost. Use Ctrl+F11 to reposition and Escape to cancel.
chilieconomypaneldefault_option_showusag: Show the Metal Pull/Metal Income as a percentage. Use Ctrl+F11 to reposition and Escape to cancel.
chilieconomypaneldefault_option_showwind: Show wind strength as a percentage. Use Ctrl+F11 to reposition and Escape to cancel.
chiliendgamewindow_option_togglestatsgra: Shows and hides the statistics graph.
chilifactorypanel_option_showallplayers_: When spectating, show the factory queues of all players. When disabled, only shows the factory queue of the currently spectated player.
chilifactorypanel_option_showeta_desc: Show ETA for the unit currently being built.
chiligesturemenu_option_allowformultiple: Allows gestures even for multiple units selected
chiligesturemenu_option_alternatekeyboar: Centre hotkeys around D instead of S.
chiligesturemenu_option_mouseidlethresho: When you hold right button still, menu appears after this time(s)
chiligesturemenu_option_mousemovethresho: When you hold right button, you must move this distance(squared) to show menu
chiligesturemenu_option_onlyopenwithkeyb: Disables right click drag to open
chiliglobalcommands_option_hidegbc_desc: Hides the Global Bar of Commands.
chiliglobalcommands_option_toggleeconomy: Show metal, geo spots and energy grid
chiliintegralmenu_option_altinsertsbehin: When enabled, the Alt modifier will insert construction behind the current item in the queue. When disabled, and if the factory is not set to repeat, Alt will insert the command in front of the current construction (destroying its progress).
chiliintegralmenu_option_constructionclo: When enabled, issuing or cancelling a construction command will switch back to the Orders tab (except for build options in the factory queue tab).
chiliintegralmenu_option_ctrldisableshot: When enabled, grid and tab hotkeys will deactivate while Ctrl is held. This allows for Ctrl+key hotkeys to be used while a construtor or factory is selected.
chiliintegralmenu_option_enablereturnfir: When enabled, the Hold Fire state is extended to a three-option toggle with Return Fire as an additional option.
chiliintegralmenu_option_enableroammoves: When enabled, the Hold Position state is extended to a three-option toggle with Roam as an additional option.
chiliintegralmenu_option_factoriesusegri: When enabled, factory unit production uses grid hotkeys.
chiliintegralmenu_option_largestateicons: Large state icons are arranged in four rows and display their hotkey (if the hotkey is short). When disabled, the icons are arranged in five rows and do not display hotkeys. Individual states can be added or removed under Settings -> Interface -> Commands.
chiliintegralmenu_option_resettodefault_: Show the basic commands and hide the advanced ones
chiliintegralmenu_option_selectioncloses: When enabled, selecting a construction command will switch back to the Orders tab (except for build options in the factory queue tab).
chilikeyboardmenu_option_rowsof7keys_des: Each row has 7 keys instead of the 6 default.
chiliminimap_option_clearoverlays_desc: Disables Heightmap, Pathing and Line of Sight overlays.
chiliminimap_option_erasemapdrawing_desc: Erases all map drawing and markers (for you, not for others on your team).
chiliminimap_option_mapdrawinghotkey_des: Hold this hotkey to draw on the map and write messages. Left click to draw, right click to erase, middle click to place a marker. Double left click to type a marker message.
chiliminimap_option_simplifiedminimapcol: Show minimap blips as green for you, teal for allies and red for enemies (only minimap will use this simple color scheme).
chiliminimap_option_startwithlosenabled_: Game starts with Line of Sight Overlay enabled
chiliminimap_option_toggleeconomyoverlay: Show metal, geo spots and energy grid
chiliminimap_option_togglelineofsight_de: Shows sight distance and radar coverage.
chiliminimap_option_togglepathingmap_des: Select a unit to see where it can go. Select a building blueprint to see where it can be placed.
chiliminimap_option_zoomtolastmessage_de: Moves the camera to the most recently placed map marker or message.
chiliproconsole2_option_backlogarrow_des: Enable the button to swap between chat and backlog chat.
chiliproconsole2_option_changemessageent: With this enabled the text-entering font will be changed to match the chat. May cause Spring to competely lock up intermittently on load. Requires reload to update.
chiliproconsole2_option_defaultallychat_: Sets default chat mode to allies at game start
chiliproconsole2_option_enablebacklogats: Starts with the backlog chat enabled.
chiliproconsole2_option_enablechatbackgr: Enables a background for the text-entering box.
chiliproconsole2_option_mousewheelbacklo: Scroll the backlog chat with the mousewheel.
chiliproconsole2_option_togglebacklog_de: The toggle backlog button is here to let you hotkey this action.
chiliproconsole_option_autotogglebacklog: Enable to have the backlog enabled when entering text and disabled when not entering text.
chiliproconsole_option_backlongarrowonri: Puts the backlong arrow on the right. It appear on the left if disabled..
chiliproconsole_option_changemessageente: With this enabled the text-entering font will be changed to match the chat. May cause Spring to competely lock up intermittently on load. Requires reload to update.
chiliproconsole_option_defaultchatmode_d: Sets default chat mode to allies at game start
chiliproconsole_option_enablebacklogatst: Starts with the backlog chat enabled.
chiliproconsole_option_enablechatbackgro: Enables a background for the text-entering box.
chiliproconsole_option_hidearrowwhennotc: Enable to hide the backlog arrow when not entering chat.
chiliproconsole_option_hidewhennotchatti: Hide the chat completely when not entering chat.
chiliproconsole_option_mousewheelbacklog: Scroll the backlog chat with the mousewheel.
chiliproconsole_option_showbacklogarrow_: Enable the button to swap between chat and backlog chat.
chiliproconsole_option_togglebacklog_des: The toggle backlog button is here to let you hotkey this action.
chiliselectionscursortip_option_ctrlsele: Hold Ctrl and click on some units. These units will be selected when Ctrl is released.
chiliselectionscursortip_option_iconsize: Show reload progress for jumpjets (only for ungrouped unit selection)
chiliselectionscursortip_option_opacity_: Mouse clicks through empty parts of the panel act on whatever is underneath.
chiliselectionscursortip_option_showdraw: Show tooltips for units behind empty interface panels.
chiliselectionscursortip_option_showmapd: Show map-drawing tooltip when holding down the tilde (~).
chiliselectionscursortip_option_showterr: Show terraform tooltip when performing terraform commands.
chiliselectionscursortip_option_showtool: Show the tooltip for unreclaimable features.
Show the tooltip for wreckage and map features.
chiliselectionscursortip_option_tooltipd: Determines how long you can leave the mouse idle until the tooltip is displayed.
chilisharemenuv124_option_fixhotkeysonst: Fixes old hotkey issues once and then disables.
chilisharemenuv124_option_showplayerlist: Hold this button to bring up the Player List.
chilisharemenuv124_option_showplayerrati: Shows the WHR current rating of each player after their name. Uses the rating category of the current game mode (Casual or MM).
chilispectatorpanels_option_flowasarrows: Use arrows instead of a number for the flow. Each arrow is 5 resources per second.
clippycomments_option_cartoonbubbles_des: Use cartoon bubbles + font instead of a standard panel.
clippycomments_option_ranklimit_desc: Units make comments only to newbies.
clippycomments_option_warningforexpensiv: Units complain about expensive units made early game.
cloakfirestate2_option_holdfirewhencloak: Units which cloak will hold fire so as not to reveal themselves.
combooverheadfreecameraexperimental_opti: Track the selected unit (mouse midclick to exit mode)
Trackmode will (probably) cancel when doing the type of camera rotation enabled by Alt.
Trackmode will (probably) cancel when doing the type of camera rotation enabled by Ctrl.
Make the camera unaffected by holding Alt.
Make the camera unaffected by holding Ctrl.
Make the camera unaffected by holding Shift.
Moves object under cursor to screen center. Only works when zooming to cursor.

3rd Person track the selected unit (mouse midclick to exit mode). Press arrow key to jump to nearby units, or move mouse to edge of screen to jump to current unit selection (will exit mode if no selection).
Be free. Camera movement not bound to map edge. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK!\nTips: press TAB if you get lost.
Invert the scroll wheel direction for altitude.
Invert the tilt direction when using ctrl+mousewheel.
Invert the scroll wheel direction for zooming.
This speed applies to edge scrolling and keyboard keys.
This speed applies to scrolling with the middle button.
Tracking speed while cursor is off-screen. \n\nRecommend: Highest (prevent missed action)
Tracking speed while cursor is on-screen. \n\nRecommend: Lowest (prevent jerky movement)
Disable tilt, instead keeping the camera at a fixed tilt set by Tilt override value.
Height multiplier for looking over the shoulter.
If you double-tap the group numbers (1,2,3 etc.) it will move the camera position to different clusters of units within the group rather than to the average position of the entire group.
How quickly do you have to double-tap group numbers to move the camera? Smaller timeout means faster tapping.
Trackmode will not cancel when deselecting unit. Trackmode will always attempt to track newly selected unit. Press mouse midclick to cancel this mode.
Reset the camera position and orientation. Map a hotkey or use <Ctrl> + <Alt> + <Middleclick>
When returning from overview mode, rotate the camera to its original position (only applies when you have set an overview viewpoint).
Rotate world using origin at the cursor rather than the center of screen.
Controls how smoothly the camera rotates.
A smoother way to scroll. Applies to all types of mouse/keyboard scrolling.
Controls how smoothly the camera moves.
Use smoothscroll method when mouse scrolling.
How tilted the camera is when fully zoomed in. 0.1 is fully tilted, 2.0 is not tilted.
Have the camera tilt while zooming. Camera faces ground when zoomed out, and looks out nearly parallel to ground when fully zoomed in
Go to overview mode, then restore view to cursor position.
Disable zoom changes while track rotating.
Trackmode works while rotating, but may cause a bug.
Zoom-in speed when cursor is on-screen. Default: 50%
Zoom-out speed when cursor is at screen edge and off-screen. Default: 50%
Center the map as you zoom out.
commandsfx_option_indicateforclicks_desc: Draw the command indication for every click.
commandsfx_option_indicateforcustomforma: Draw the command indication for commands given with custom formations.
commnelostartposinfo_option_showrankicon: Show rank icon under player name before game start
contextmenu_option_createwindowundercurs: Creates the window under the mouse cursor, otherwise uses the values below for position.
contextmenu_option_shortnumbernotation_d: Shows short number notation for HP and other values.
customformations2_option_evenlyspreaduni: Evenly spread unit types along lines
customformations2_option_formationranksp: The gap between front and back formations. All units start at the same formation rank by default. Enable Formation Rank in Settings/Interface/Commands or edit Formation Rank in Settings/Unit Behaviour/Default States.
customformations2_option_mergespreadgrou: Groups of unit types of this size and smaller are merged into the largest group when spreading unit types evenly along the line.
customformations2_option_overrideguardon: When enabled, dragging a short line on a unit will give move commands rather than a guard command.
customformations2_option_rmbcanissueline: When enabled you can also issue the line formation command with dragging rmb, clicking rmb without moving still cancels.
decloakrange_option_drawmergedcloakcircl: Merge overlapping grid circle visualisation. Does not work on older hardware and should automatically disable.
defaultgrouprecallfix_option_enabletimeo: When enabled, the key must be pressed twice in quick sucession to zoom to a control group.
defaultgrouprecallfix_option_shiftaddsto: When enabled, hold shift and press a group hotkey to add the selected units to the group.
devcommands_option_moveunit_desc: Move selected unit to the mouse cursor.
devcommands_option_moveunitsnap_desc: Move selected unit to the mouse cursor. Snaps to grid.
displaykeys2_option_showinputvisualizer_: Shows pressed key combinations and mouse buttons. Useful for video tutorials.
doubleclickattackmove_option_doubleright: Double right-click gives an Attack-Move order instead of Move.
dynamicavoidancesystem_option_cloakiesal: Force cloakies & constructor to always flee from enemy when idle except if they are under hold-position state. \n\nNote: Unit can wander around and could put themselves in danger. Default:Off
dynamicavoidancesystem_option_constructo: Amount in second before constructor retreat command auto-expire (is deleted), and then constructor will return to its previous area-reclaim command.\n\nTips: small value is better.
dynamicavoidancesystem_option_debugconst: Widget to issue a retreat order first before issuing an avoidance (to reduce chance of avoidance putting constructor into more danger).\n\nDefault:On.
dynamicavoidancesystem_option_enableforg:
Enable for ground units (INCLUDE Commander).

All ground unit will avoid enemy while being outside camera view and/or while reloading except when hold-position state is used.

Tips:
1) is optimized for masses of Thug or Knight.
2) You can use Guard to make your unit swarm the guarded unit in presence of enemy.
Default:On
dynamicavoidancesystem_option_findbase_d: Allow constructor to return to base when having area-reclaim or area-ressurect command, else it will return to center of the circle when retreating. \n\nTips: build 3 new buildings at new location to identify as base, unit will automatically select nearest base. Default:On
dynamicavoidancesystem_option_jinkduring: Unit with slow reload will randomly jink to random direction when attacking. NOTE: This have no benefit and bad versus fast attacker or fast weapon but have high chance of dodging versus slow ballistic weapon. Default:On
dynamicavoidancesystem_option_retreating: Force retreating unit to always avoid the enemy (Note: this require the use of RETREAT functionality provided by cmd_retreat.lua widget a.k.a unit retreat widget). Default:On
economicvictoryannouncer_option_economym: A team wins if it has this times more value than any other team.
externalvrgrid_option_range10248192_desc: How far outside the map to draw
externalvrgrid_option_tilesize64512_desc: Sets tile size (lower = more detail)\nStepsize is 64; recommend powers of 2
factoryplateplacer_option_ctrltogglesfac: When placing a factory or plate, press Ctrl to select whether a factory or construction plate is placed.
globalbuildcommand_option_alwaysshow_des: If this is enabled queued commands will always be displayed, otherwise they are only visible when \255\200\200\200shift\255\255\255\255 is held.\n (default = false)
globalbuildcommand_option_autoreclaimres: Automatically add reclaim/res for wrecks near your base. This does not target map features and is not a replacement for area reclaim/res.\n (default = false)
globalbuildcommand_option_autorepair_des: Automatically add repair jobs whenever units are damaged.\n (Note: If this is enabled, repair jobs will only be visible when \255\200\200\200shift\255\255\255\255 is held!) \n (default = false)
globalbuildcommand_option_drawstatusicon: Check to draw status icons over each unit, which shows its command state.\n (default = true)
globalbuildcommand_option_globalbuildove: Units controlled by global build command will be treated as a different selection rank.
globalbuildcommand_option_globalbuildsel: Units controlled by global build command are treated as this selection rank, if override is enabled.
globalbuildcommand_option_intelligentcos: Tries to optimize build order for better worker safety and faster overall construction, but makes it \nmore difficult to control what gets built first.\n (default = true)
globalbuildcommand_option_separateconstr: Replace factory inherited orders for constructors so that they can be assigned jobs immediately.\n (default = true)
globalbuildcommand_option_splitareacomma: Automatically capture single targets from area commands so that more workers will be assigned to those jobs.\n (default = true)
globalbuildcommand_option_workerupdatera: Worker Update Rate (higher numbers are faster but more CPU intensive):
guardremove_option_additionalqueueremove: Removes non-terminating commands (guard and patrol) from command queues when additional commands are queued.
guardremove_option_repairinfactoryqueues: Prevents accidentally not assisting by right clicking on the unit in the factory instead of the factory.
havenhandler_option_cancelretreat_desc: Set your selected units to not retreat. It might be useful to assign it a hotkey.
havenhandler_option_onlyshowmyzones_desc: With this enabled you will only see your retreat zones.
healthbars_option_jumpreloadflash_desc: Set jump reload to flash when issuing the jump command
healthbars_option_unitbarfadeheight_desc: If the camera is above this height, health bars will not be drawn.
healthbars_option_unitbarpercentageheigh: If the camera is above this height, health bar percentages will not be drawn.
healthbars_option_unitbartitleheightt_de: If the camera is above this height, health bar titles will not be drawn.
healthbars_option_wreckagebarfadeheight_: If the camera is above this height, health bars will not be drawn.
healthbars_option_wreckagebarpercentageh: If the camera is above this height, health bar percentages will not be drawn.
healthbars_option_wreckagebartitleheight: If the camera is above this height, health bar titles will not be drawn.
hideinterfaceandmousecursor_option_hidei: Toggle to show/hide the interface and mouse cursor.
highlightunitgl4_option_useallyhovercove: Use ally hover cover for self
holdctrlduringplacementtomorph_option_mo: Morph buildings when placed with Ctrl
If queued holding Ctrl, morphable buildings will start morphing when finished.
hudpresets_option_resetonscreenresolutio: Resets the UI when screen resolution changes. Disable if you plan to customise your UI.
hudpresets_option_settodefaultonce_desc: Resets the HUD to the default next time this widget is initialized.
hudpresets_option_stayuptodate_desc: Updates your UI when new defaults are released.
iconheight_option_iconheight_desc:
If the camera is above this height, all units will be icons; if below, no units will be icons.

Only applies when the icon display mode is set to Dynamic.

This setting overrides Icon Distance.
iconheight_option_iconmodehotkey_desc:
Define a hotkey to switch between icon display modes (On/Off/Dynamic).

Single-press to switch between On/Off.

Double-press to switch to Dynamic.
iconsets_option_showconstructorchassis_d: Do constructor icons show chassis? Conveys more information but reduces visibility somewhat.
iconsets_option_usestandardshipicons_des: Do ships use the standarized chassis-role icons instead of hull shape pictograms?
iconzoomtransition_option_iconmodehotkey:
Define a hotkey to switch between icon display modes (On/Off/Dynamic).

Single-press to switch between On/Off.

Double-press to switch to Dynamic.
iconzoomtransition_option_icontransition:
If the camera is below this height, units will be models only.

Only applies when the icon display mode is set to Dynamic.

This setting overrides Icon Distance.
Opacity of the icons when the transition begins.
Size of the icons when the transition begins.
Opacity of the icons when the transition ends.
Size of the icons when the transition ends.

If the camera is above this height, units will be icons only.

Only applies when the icon display mode is set to Dynamic.

This setting overrides Icon Distance.
keeptarget_option_prioritiseoverriddenat: Cancelling an attack command by issuing a movement command continues prioritising the target of the previous attack command.
keeptarget_option_stopclearstarget_desc: Target prioritisation is reset by Stop, Fight, Guard, Patrol and Attack commands.
lassoterraformgui_option_mousedragthresh: Dragging the mouse more than this many pixels to start registering as a mouse movement.
lassoterraformgui_option_terraformbyhold: When enabled, holding down the left mouse button while placing a structure will enter height selection mode.
lassoterraformgui_option_terraformbysele: When enabled, holding Alt while selecting a build option (either on the command card or with a hotkey) will cause height selection mode when the structure is placed.
lobsterunitshighlighter_option_checkrang: Do not draw highlight for Lobsters that out of range of the cursor.
lobsterunitshighlighter_option_checkrelo: Do not draw highlight for Lobsters that are reloading.
lobsterunitshighlighter_option_defaultvi: Highlight units which will be lobbed. When disabled, circles are drawn below units that show more information.
lobsterunitshighlighter_option_showeffec: Draws a circle around Lobsters showing their effect range.
mapedgebarrier_option_drawforislands_des: Draws boundary wall when map is an island
mapedgeextension_option_curvatureeffect_: Add a curvature to the extension.
mapedgeextension_option_drawforislands_d: Draws mirror map when map is an island
mapedgeextension_option_edgefogeffect_de: Blurs the edges of the map slightly to distinguish it from the extension.
mapedgeextension_option_gridtilesize2n_d: Cannot be less than heightmap resolution
mapedgeextension_option_useshader_desc: Use a shader when mirroring the map
metalfeaturesgl3old_option_minimumreclai: Metal below this amount will not be highlighted
metalfeaturesgl3old_option_showreclaimbe: Enabled: Show reclaimable metal features before game begins \n Disabled: No highlights before game begins
metalfeaturesgl4_option_minimumreclaimto: Metal below this amount will not be highlighted
metalfeaturesgl4_option_showreclaimbefor: Enabled: Show reclaimable metal features before game begins \n Disabled: No highlights before game begins
metalfeaturesveryold_option_highlightedr: Increase or decrease visibility of effect
metalfeaturesveryold_option_minimumrecla: Metal below this amount will not be highlighted
metalfeaturesveryold_option_showreclaimb: Enabled: Show reclaimable metal features before game begins \n Disabled: No highlights before game begins
mexplacementhandler_option_deepburrydept: How deep should a deeper burried mex (hold Alt+Ctrl) be?
mexplacementhandler_option_displaydecima: How precise should the number be?\nNo effect on icons.
mexplacementhandler_option_highwallheigh: How high should a tall terraformed wall (hold Ctrl) be?
mexplacementhandler_option_incomedisplay: How large should the font or icon be?
mexplacementhandler_option_lowwallheight: How high should a default terraformed wall be?
mexplacementhandler_option_pointclickque: Clicking on the map with Area Mex or Area Terra Mex snaps to the nearest spot, like placing a mex.
mexplacementhandler_option_shallowburryd: How deep should a burried mex (hold Alt) be?
mexplacementhandler_option_showincomeasi: Enabled: income is shown pictorially.\nDisabled: income is shown as a number.
miscdefaultcommandreplacements_option_ri: If enabled, rightclicking a constructor will always Guard it.\nIf disabled, the command can be Repair.
If enabled, rightclicking a factory will always Guard it.\nIf disabled, the command can be Repair.
Right click sets target instead of attacking
If enabled, rightclicking an enemy will give the Set Target command.\nIf disabled, the command is Attack.
missilesilorange_option_advancedmissiles: When placing a Missile Silo, show at what range the missiles will fall vertically, ie. are unblockable by terrain geometry and walls. Also, show how far away from the nominal range you can reach through AoE.
musicplayer_option_useincludedtracks_des: Use the tracks included with Zero-K
newsticker_option_minimumcostmult120_des: Multiplies metal income for minimum cost of newsworthy units
newtonfirezone_option_alwaysdrawfirezone: Enable to always draw Newton firezones. Otherwise they are only drawn on selection.
newtonfirezone_option_droppredictionspee: Draw prediction for transports above this speed.
newtonfirezone_option_jumponprediction_d: Enable to have jumpjet units jump to the predicted land location.
outlinenoshader_option_lowqualityoutline: Reduces outline accuracy to improve perfomance, only recommended for low-end machines
outlinenoshader_option_outlinethickness_: How thick the outline appears around objects
outlinenoshader_option_scalewithdistance: Reduces the screen space width of outlines when zoomed out.
outlinenoshader_option_subtlescalewithdi: Reduces the screen space width of outlines when zoomed out, in a subtle way.
outlinenoshader_option_zoomscaleminimum_: Minimum outline thickness muliplier when zoomed out.
outlineshadergl3_option_outlinethickness: How thick the outline appears around objects
outlineshadergl3_option_scalewithdistanc: Reduces the screen space width of outlines when zoomed out.
outlineshadergl3_option_subtlescalewithd: Reduces the screen space width of outlines when zoomed out, in a subtle way.
outlineshadergl3_option_zoomscaleminimum: Minimum outline thickness muliplier when zoomed out.
outlineshadergl4_option_outlinethickness: How thick the outline appears around objects
outlineshadergl4_option_scalewithdistanc: Reduces the screen space width of outlines when zoomed out.
outlineshadergl4_option_subtlescalewithd: Reduces the screen space width of outlines when zoomed out, in a subtle way.
outlineshadergl4_option_zoomscaleminimum: Minimum outline thickness muliplier when zoomed out.
pausescreen_option_disablevoice_desc: Remember to not play voice-over for pausing anymore.
pausescreen_option_pausescreenautomatica: Automatically fade to background without needing to click it.
persistentbuildheight_option_altmousewhe: Alt mouse wheel to set height
persistentbuildheight_option_lowerstruct: Decrease the height of structure terraform. Also possible with Alt + Scrollwheel.
persistentbuildheight_option_raisestruct: Increase the height of structure terraform. Also possible with Alt + Scrollwheel.
persistentbuildheight_option_togglestruc: Press during structure placement to make a strucutre on a spire or a hold. Alt + MMB also toggles this mode.
persistentbuildspacing_option_accordingt: In case of building moving units, the placement grid is misleading, uncheck this is you want to see the rectangles following where the placements will really occur.
persistentbuildspacing_option_changewith: Change the spacing Shift down and the MouseWheel
persistentbuildspacing_option_decreasebu: Decrease the spacing between structures queued in a line or rectangle. Hold Shift to queue a line of structures. Add Alt to queue a rectangle. Add Ctrl to queue a hollow rectangle.
persistentbuildspacing_option_followingt: ..unless, of course, if it should float !
persistentbuildspacing_option_increasebu: Increase the spacing between structures queued in a line or rectangle. Hold Shift to queue a line of structures. Add Alt to queue a rectangle. Add Ctrl to queue a hollow rectangle.
persistentbuildspacing_option_ofonlytwor: If 8 rectangles bug you too much, only show 2 horizontal rectangles
persistentbuildspacing_option_rotatecloc: Rotate the structure placement blueprint clockwise.
persistentbuildspacing_option_rotatecoun: Rotate the structure placement blueprint counterclockwise.
persistentbuildspacing_option_visualises: Briefly show spaced rectangles in all directions around the cursor
persistentbuildspacing_option_withbadcol: Reddish color if it cannot be placed
playernametags_option_onlytagcommanders_: Name tags will only be shown on Commanders
projectilelights_option_fadeprojectiles_: Projectile lights smoothly fade out after the projectile disappears.
projectilelights_option_overrideparamete: Override lights with the following parameters.
projectilelights_option_reload_desc: Reload settings from the next projectile fired.
projectilelights_option_uselod_desc: Reduces the number of lights drawn based on camera distance and current fps.
reclaimfieldhighlight_option_fieldflashi: How intensely the reclaim fields should pulse over time
reclaimfieldhighlight_option_fontscaling: How quickly the font size of the metal value display should grow with the size of the field
reclaimfieldhighlight_option_maximumfont: The largest font size to use for the largest reclaim fields
reclaimfieldhighlight_option_minimumfont: The smallest font size to use for the smallest reclaim fields
replaycontrolbuttons_option_progressbar_: Show progress bar for the replay
selectedunitsgl42_option_allyselectionst: Opacity multiplier for ally selections when playing
selectedunitsgl42_option_drawselectionsi: If disabled, selections are only drawn below units and never above - even for planes. This can cause the selection to be invisible. On the other hand, disabling this can increase performance.
selectedunitsgl42_option_fillopacity_des: Opacity of the selection fill - 0 is invisble
selectedunitsgl42_option_outlineopacity_: Opacity of the selection outline - 1 is solid
selectedunitsgl42_option_playerselection: Opacity multiplier for player selections while spectating
selectedunitsgl42_option_selectionheight: How much to float the selection above the unit baseline - a value of 0 is more likely to be clipped by units
selectionblurryhalo2_option_outlinethick: How thick the outline appears around objects
selectionblurryhalo2_option_showallysele: Highlight the units your allies currently have selected.
selectionhierarchy_option_controlgroupsi: Control groups ignore rank difference above:
Allows selecting entire control groups of differing selection rank.
selectionhierarchy_option_doubleclickign: Double click ignores rank difference above:
Allows for double click selection of many units of the same type and differing selection rank.
selectionhierarchy_option_enableselectio: Enables selection rank, which filters constructors from combat units by default.
selectionhierarchy_option_holdalttofilte: Hold Alt to filter out ranks above:
Useful for selecting low-rank units, such as constructors as they default to rank 2.
selectionhierarchy_option_holdctrltoigno: Hold Ctrl to ignore rank difference above:
Useful so that global selection hotkeys (such as Ctrl+Z) can expand upon a mixed selection.
selectionhierarchy_option_onlyfilterwhen: Only filter when Alt is held
Enable selection filtering when Alt is held. Requires the main selection filtering option to be enabled.
selectionhierarchy_option_retreatdeselec: Whether a unit that starts retreating will be deselected, so as not to keep accidentally bringing units back into danger.
selectionhierarchy_option_retreatoverrid: Retreating units will be treated as a different selection rank.
selectionhierarchy_option_retreatselecti: Retreating units are treated as this selection rank, if override is enabled.
selectionmodkeys_option_newleftclicksele: Implements new modifiers for left clicking on units. There is essentially no reason to disable this.
selectionmodkeys_option_selectionleewayd: If the mouse is clicked and released within the leeway time, and moves less than the leeway distance, then the unit clicked on will be selected.
selectionmodkeys_option_selectionleewayt: If the mouse is clicked and released within the leeway time, and moves less than the leeway distance, then the unit clicked on will be selected.
showallcommands_option_includeallyunits_: When showing commands, show them for both your own and your allies units.
showallcommands_option_includeneutraluni: Toggle whether to show commands for neutral units (relevant while spectating).
showecoandgriddrawer_option_alwaysshowme: Show metal extractors even when the full economy overlay is not enabled.
showecoandgriddrawer_option_drawgridinqu: Shows the grid of not-yet constructed buildings in the queue of a selected constructor. Activates only when placing grid structures.
showecoandgriddrawer_option_drawmergedgr: Merge overlapping grid circle visualisation. Does not work on older hardware and should automatically disable.
showecoandgriddrawer_option_startwitheco: Game starts with Economy Overlay enabled
simplesettings_option_alwaysshowmexes_de: Show metal extractors even when the full economy overlay is not enabled.
simplesettings_option_enableselectionfil: Filter constructors out of mixed unit selections.
simplesettings_option_grabinputlockmouse: Prevents the cursor from leaving the Window/Screen.
simplesettings_option_minimaponright_des: Toggle whether the minimap is on the left or right.
simplesettings_option_startwitheconomyov: Enable the economy overlay when the game starts.
simplesettings_option_toggleunitoutline_: Draws a black outline around units.
smokesignals_option_smokesignalmarkers_d: Labels are additionally marked by a smoke signal flare.
spectateselectedteam_option_selectnextpl: Quickly select next player. Hotkey this button.
spotter_option_showcirclearoundenemies_d: Show a hard circle rround enemy units
startupinfoandselector_option_startposit: Distance that the start position zoom zooms the camera to.
stateicons_option_armorstatevisibility_d: When to show an icon for armored units.
stateicons_option_prioritystatevisibilit: When to show an icon for prioritized units.
stateicons_option_showmiscpriortyonshift: When holding shift, an icon appears over unit with low or high misc priority (morph or stockpile).
stateicons_option_showmovefirestatesonsh: When holding shift, icons appear over units indicating move state and fire state.
stereo3d_option_enablestereo3d_desc: Turn Stereo3D vision on or off.
stereo3d_option_separation_desc: How far apart your eyes are.
teamhighlightoption_option_laggingplayer: When enabled, the units of lagging players will flash (with increasing intensity as their latency increases).
transportai_option_ignoreconstructorsfro: Enable to not transport newly completed constructors.
transportai_option_lingeronconstructortr: Enable to make transports sit next to constructors after transporting them.
transportai_option_transportfromfactory_: When enabled newly completed units will be transported to the waypoint of their parent factory.
uniticons_option_drawonicons_desc: Draws state icons when zoomed out.
unitshapes2_option_highlighthoveredunit_: Highlight the unit under your cursor.
unitshapes2_option_highlightunitsinselec: Highlight the units in the selection box.
unittargetcommandhelper_option_areacomma: Distance that the mouse must move to issue an area command.
unittargetcommandhelper_option_speedyuni: When enabled, clicking on a unit will target it even if it is no longer under the mouse when the click is released.
verticallineonradardots_option_showforal: Draw the lines for allied units
verticallineonradardots_option_showforen: Draw a line perpendicular to the ground for enemy airborne units
Draw a line perpendicular to the surface for enemy submerged units
widgetprofiler_option_hidelowvalues_desc: Hide readings for widgets with <0.5% FPS cost
xrayhaloselections_option_showallyselect: Highlight the units your allies currently have selected.
xrayshader_option_maximumdistance_desc: Distance at which XRay effect is at full strength
xrayshader_option_minimumdistance_desc: Minimum distance for XRay effect to show up
